nodes.text: An escaped Nightsister slave was a prisoner of the Nightsisters on the planet Dathomir. He was among the strongest of their slaves and therefore selected to work in their mines at the Nightsister Forced Labor Camp.

In 1 ABY the slave managed to escape from the Nightsisters' mines and tried to find someone that would help free the other slaves. The local Imperial forces turned his request down, as the Empire had no interest in freeing slaves. He eventually made it to the Trade Outpost near the Singing Mountain, where he met an adventurer from the stars. The adventurer showed interest in the plight of the Nightsisters' slaves and promised to help them. The slave uploaded the mine's coordinates to the adventurer's datapad, hoping to see his friend again soon.

The Escaped Nightsister Slave was a Non-Player Character (NPC) in Sony Online Entertainment's MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. He could be found in the Trade Outpost on Dathomir. He was one of many herald NPCs that were added to the game shortly after its launch to point players to dungeons and other points of interest. When a player talked to him and agreed to help, a waypoint was added to the player's datapad. When the player talked to him again, the same dialogue started from the beginning.
His appearance and species changed with every server restart, but his gender remained the same.
